name: LabelPrint Project File
summary: Learn about .LPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LPP files can be printed to special disc label paper when complete. LabelPrint supports many different paper and printer formats.

description: CD/DVD label design created by CyberLink LabelPrint, a program used for designing disc labels and jewel-case inlays; can be a design for a disc, mini disc, front cover, back cover, or disc inlay; often contains disc art, a song list, and artist information.
